loans.name: Villa Santa Clara Group

texts.en:
VilL. Santa Clara is a small community bank of FINCA Peru’s Wari Project. The bank provides credit and educational services in the rural areas of Huancavelica. Huancavelica is considered one of the poorest regions of Peru and has many limitations because it's a cold and very mountainous area (with altituD. ranges from 6,000-17,000 feet above sea level), it's difficult to grow crops there, and it lacks an adequate infrastructure of roads and communication systems.

BCR VilL. Santa Clara is located the community of Cosme in the Anco district of the Churcampa province. The population mainly grows either corn (in the lower altitudes) or potatoes and wheat (in the higher altitudes) and raises guinea-pigs, pigs and chicken. But the size of the community and its (limited) access to public transport, has brought mO. commerce to the village. There are several restaurants, grocery stores, and kiosks.

The bank has completed its first loan cycle in just half a year of existence. A total of 11,700 soles (about $4,000.00) has been loaned to 24 women. The loans range from 100, 200, 400, and 600 soles, and, in three cases, 1,000 soles. The group was able to save over 2,400 soles (about $830.00) in their first cycle and will continue to save in the future. For all the members, the main use of the savings is to invest in their businesses or for the education of their children: to buy school uniforms, supplies, books and even to pay for them to enter primary or secondary school.

During their first loan cycle, the members have learned many things: to work under a mutual agreement, to be responsible, to save, and to receive training in a variety of issues. Another thing they like is practicing values like punctuality, responsibility, and solidarity.

Rosario Severina Q. L. runs a grocery stO. and a restaurant where she gives pension to teachers. To earn a little mO. money, she sells chicken and trout in her restaurant during community festivities when a lot of people come from different communities nearby. With her loan of 1,000 soles, she will buy new supplies for her stO. and the restaurant. When asked about her future, she says that she is saving for the education of her children so they can keep studying and become professionals.

Lucia Gómez D. sells meals in her small kiosk and the main street. With her husband, she runs another business taking passengers to a nearby community in their moto-taxi. With her loan of 1,000 soles, she will buy mO. supplies for her kiosk. Her dream for the future is to buy a small terrain near the central square on which to build a house. Currently her house is far away and does not work well for running a business. With her savings she wants to improve her business, selling soft-drinks, and send her children to school.

Clara TeofiL. V. P., who has a loan of 600 soles, has a small grocery stO. and some terrain where she cultivates corn. Her dream for the future is the progress of her children and her family. With her savings she will invest in two things: improving her business and paying for her son's education.

loans.use: To buy new supplies

loans.name: Rocio Graciela's Group

texts.es:
Rocío, Lourdes and Yolanda have belonged to Communal Bank Mirachisun, which means "We Grow" in Quechua, for eight, one and one years respectively. As members of the bank, they learn how to be responsible, how to invest their money and how to save.

Rocío is single and 30 years old. She sells cosmetics via catalogue. She is also is an initial-education teacher and currently is studying cosmetology. She plans to use the loan to sell clothes.

Lourdes is 35 years old, has four children and lives with her partner. She travels to the different fairs in the region three times a week to sell groceries and brings back from them grains, small animals, cheese and other products to sell at the local market. She also makes embroideries for purses and belts for suppliers.

Yolanda is 27 years old, has three children and lives with her partner. She sells clothes at the fairs in the region and brings back tuna, cheese, grains and other products to sell at the local market.

Rocío, Lourdes and Yolanda needs loans of 400 soles (approximately $150), 400 soles and 200 soles (approximately $75) respectively, which will be used to buy shirts, skirts, cheese, peas, overalls, pants and sweaters.

Their savings will be used for their children's education, to build a home and for other necessities.

The dreams of Rocío, Lourdes and Yolanda include: finish their studies, open a beauty salon, see their children finish their education, make their businesses bigger and have a store.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

Rocío, Lourdes y Yolanda pertenecen al Banco Comunal Mirachisun que significa “Hagamos Crecer” en quechua, hace 8, 1, 1 años respectivamente. En su Banco Comunal aprendieron a ser responsables, como invertir el dinero y a ahorrar.

Rocio es soltera y tiene 30 años, Rocio vende cosméticos por catálogos al crédito. Además Rocio es Profesora de educación inicial y actualmente esta estudiando cosmetología. Rocio con el préstamo que obtendrá tiene proyectado vender ropa.

Por otro lado Lourdes es conviviente, tiene 35 años y 4 hijos, Lourdes viaja a las diferentes ferias de la región 3 veces por semana, donde vende abarrotes y de las ferias trae cereales, animales menores, queso, productos que vende en el mercado Nery García. Además Lourdes trabaja haciendo bordados de bolsos, correas para intermediarios.

Mientras que Yolanda es conviviente, tiene 27 años y 3 hijos, Yolanda vende ropa en las ferias de la región de Ayacucho y de las ferias trae tuna, queso, cereales, productos que son vendidos en el mercado Nery García.

Rocío, Lourdes y Yolanda necesitan préstamos de 400 soles, 400 soles, 200 soles, dinero que será invertido en la compra de polos, faldas, queso, arveja, buzos, pantalones y chompas.

Sus ahorros serán utilizados en la educación de sus hijos, para construir su casa y alguna necesidad.

Los sueños de Rocío, Lourdes y Yolanda son terminar sus estudios, implementar su salón de belleza, que sus hijos terminen de estudiar, su negocio sea mas grande y tener una tienda.

loans.use: Rocío, Lourdes and Yolanda needs loans of 400 soles (approximately $150), 400 soles and 200 soles (approximately $75) respectively, which will be used to buy shirts, skirts, cheese, peas, overalls, pants and sweaters.

loans.name: Donatilda's Group

texts.es:
Donatilda, Digna and Danitza have belonged to Communal Bank Mirachisun, which means "We Grow" in Quechua, for one year. As members of the bank they learn how to better administer their money, to save, and to be punctual and responsible.

Donatilda is married, 60 years old and has nine children, two of whom live with her. She has sold fruit at a local outdoor market for the past four years.

Digna is 40 years old with eight children and lives with her partner. She travels to the city once a week to sell tuna, regional breads and aromatic herbs, and depending on the season, brings back grapes to sell.

Danitza is single and 22 years old. Along with her parents, she has a restaurant "El Zunagro" where she sells cebiche, a popular regional dish maD. with fish and lime. She's also studying nursing at the local university.

Donatilda, Digna and Danitza need loans of $75, $150 and $75 to purchase mangos, grapes, bread, tuna, limes and fish.

Donatilda, Digna and Danitza all dream to have bigger businesses, to increase their profits and that they're children will grow up and be successful and independent.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

Donatilda, Digna y Danitza pertenecen al Banco Comunal Mirachisun que significa “Hagamos Crecer” en quechua, hace 1 año. En su Banco Comunal aprendieron a administrar bien el dinero, a ahorrar, ser puntuales y responsables.

Donatilda es casada tiene 60 años y 9 hijos D. los cuales 2 viven con ella, Donatilda venD. frutas D. manera ambulante en el mercado Nery García, actividad que realiza hace 4 años.

Por otro lado Digna es conviviente, tiene 40 años y 8 hijos, Digna viaja al departamento D. Ica una vez por semana, donD. venD. tuna, panes típicos D. Ayacucho como “chapla”, hierbas aromáticas y D. Ica dependiendo D. las temporadas trae uva.

Mientras que Danitza es soltera y tiene 22 años, Danitza junto a sus padres tienen una cebichería llamado “El Zungaro”, Danitza se encarga D. las ventas. Además Danitza estudia enfermeria en la universidad.

Donatilda, Digna y Danitza necesitan prestamos D. 200 soles, 400 soles, 200 soles, dinero que será invertido en la compra D. mango, uva, pan chapla, tuna, limón y pescado.

Los sueños D. Donatilda, Digna y Danitza son tener un negocio más granD., incrementar capital, que sus hijos sean profesionales y independizarse.

loans.use: Donatilda, Digna and Danitza need loans of $75, $150 and $75 to purchase mangos, grapes, bread, tuna, limes and fish

loans.name: Amistad Group

texts.es:
<

The Friendship Communal Bank is a bank that recently formed and at present has 23 associates. Some of them were guests of associates of another Communal Bank and of the property development company. The associates have different business such as selling food, clothes, pottery, shoes, tamales, fruit, vegetables, beverages, cheeses, and groceries. Their businesses also incluD. a pharmacy, workshops and carpentry shops.

Each associate has a different story to tell, such as the case of Juana Rose who makes northern-style tamales and then sells them in the prison of the city of Ayacucho, an activity that she performs 2 times a week. With the loan that Juana Rose will obtain she plans to sell chicken soup in the door of her house.

On the other hand, Mariana sells clothes in the Marshal Cáceres country fair and with the loan that she will obtain she plans to add more products.

The associates need different amounts of loans, some amounts are of 300 soles, 600 soles, coming to a total of 11,700 soles of loans in the Communal Bank.

The loans will be invested in the purchase of rice, sugar, pots, dishes, teapots, ladies shoes, alcohol, cotton, cheese, oil, noodles, fabrics, mangos, grapes, carrots, tomatos, gourds, polos and sweaters.

The savings will be used to increase the capital of their businesses, to buy more supplies for their workshop and for the education of their children.

The dreams of the associates are to grow their business, to have a factory for the production of clothes, to own a house, to buy land, to have a shoe store and that their children become professionals.

Translated from Spanish by B, Kiva Volunteer.

El Banco Comunal Amistad es un Banco que recién inicia, actualmente tiene 23 socias, algunas D. ellas fueron invitadas por socias D. otro Banco Comunal y por la promotora.

Las socias realizan diferentes negocios como la venta D. comida, ropa, locería, zapatos, tamales, fruta, verduras, bebidas, quesos, tienda D. abarrotes, botica, taller D. confección y carpintería.

Cada socia tiene una historia diferente que contar como es el caso D. Juana Rosa que elabora tamales norteños y luego lo venD. en el penal D. la ciudad D. Ayacucho, actividad que realiza 2 veces por semana. Juana Rosa con el préstamo que obtendrá tiene proyectado vender caldo D. Gallina en la puerta D. su casa.

Por otro lado Mariana venD. ropa en el campo ferial Mariscal Cáceres y con el préstamo que obtendrá tiene proyectado incrementar mas productos.

Las socias necesitan diferentes montos D. préstamos, algunos montos son D. 300 soles, 600 soles, haciendo un total D. 11,700 soles D. préstamos en el Banco Comunal.

Los préstamos lo invertirán en la compra D. arroz, azúcar, ollas, platos, tetera, zapatos para damas, alcohol, algodón, queso, aceite, fideo, telas, mango, uva, zanahoria, tomate, zapallo, polos y chompas.

Los ahorros los utilizarán para incrementar mas el capital D. sus negocios, comprar más maquinas para su taller y para la educación D. sus hijos.

Los sueños D. las socias son que sus negocios crezcan, tener una fabrica D. producción D. ropa, casa propia, comprar terreno, tener una zapatería y que sus hijos sean profesionales.

loans.use: To purchase rice, sugar, pots, dishes, teapots, ladies shoes, alcohol, cotton, cheese, oil, noodles, fabrics, mangos, grapes, carrots, tomatos, gourds, polos and sweaters

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.es:
Hermelinda is someone that's always looking for the best for her family. Since she got married she has dedicated herself, alongside her hardworking husband, to the purchase and resale of wood logs, poles, and firewood. This business they carry on has fortunately permitted them to provide their three beloved children with an education, and they, in their spare time, help them out in their noble business gratefully. She and her life partner, they have wanted to expand their business and increase the goods they sell. They believe that with this investment they will be able to improve their income significantly. With this in mind, they request a loan that will permit them to complete their plans and realize their great dream of becoming one of the largest distributors of their product. Your support is so greatly appreciated by this family. They need your help.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

Hermelinda es una mujer que siempre ha buscado lo mejor para su familia, desde que contrajo matrimonio decidió dedicarse junto a su laborioso esposo a la compra y venta de troncos, carrizo y leña, esta actividad que desempeñan afortunadamente les esta permitiendo ofrecer estudios superiores a sus 3 queridos hijos, quienes en sus tiempos libres los apoyan afanosamente en esta noble labor.Ella y su compañero de toda la vida, tienen pensado ampliar y aumentar los insumos que ofertan en su espacio de ventas, ellos creen que con esta inversión podrán mejorar mucho sus ingresos económicos, con este propósito recurre a ti para solicitarte un préstamo de dinero que les permitirá cumplir su propósito y el gran sueño de convertirse en uno de los más grandes distribuidores de estos artículos.Tu aporte será muy agradecido por esta familia, no los dejes esperando ellos necesitan de tu ayuda.

loans.use: To increase her capital investment to offer greater quantities of firewood, wood, and poles.

loans.name: Lucía

texts.es:
Her parents' low economic resources did not permit her to continue her studies, Lucia now 26 years old. She is originally from the province of Azangaro, and her desire to improve herslef and offer support for the wellbeing of her family inspired her to move to the city of Juliaca. Since her arrival in the city she tasked herself and managed to open a small grocery store. She is now married and is mother to Nestor, a 9 year old boy. Lucia wants to increase the selection and stock quantities of her products. She believes that if she starts selling fruits and vegetables she will be filling her customers' demands and increase her income.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

Los bajos recursos económicos de sus padres no le dieron la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera profesional a la señora Lucia de 26 años de edad, ella es natural de la provincia de Azángaro, sus ganas de superarse y ofrecerle bienestar a su familia la llevaron a radicar en la ciudad de Juliaca.Desde que llegó a esta ciudad se dispuso a abrir e implementar su pequeña bodeguita de abarrotes, actualmente ya está casada y es madre de Néstor, niño de 9 años de edad.Lucia tiene pensado aumentar la variedad y el stock de su mercadería, ella cree que vendiendo verduras y frutas complacerá satisfactoriamente la demanda de sus clientes y además acrecentará sus ingresos económicos.

loans.use: To invest her more capital to increase the quantity and selection of her products.

loans.name: Magda

texts.es:
Isabel is a very happy young woman, dedicated and hard working. Since she was a young girl she was in the care of her elderly grandmother. She grew up with her and shared many happy moments, and since she passed away Isabel remembers her longingly with great love. When she was young, her beloved grandmother's only way to provide her with an education and wellbeing was to offer her humble home in providing a public washroom. Their home is located near a busy market in the city of Juliaca. Isabel's wish is to renovated the business her grandmother inherited her, as these are the earnings she can gain to pay for her education. Isabel wishes for your kind support.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

Isabel es una muchacha muy alegre, dedicada y trabajadora, desde pequeña estuvo al cuidado de su anciana abuelita, persona con quien creció y compartió momentos muy lindos, falleció y ahora Isabel la recuerda muy cariñosa y nostálgicamente. Desde pequeña el único medio que su querida abuelita encontró para ofrecerle bienestar y educación fue la de adecuar su humilde domicilio para brindar servicios higiénicos a la población, debido a que su morada está ubicada frente a un concurrido mercado de la ciudad de Juliaca.El deseo de Isabel es refaccionar el negocio que por herencia le dejó su abuelita ya que gracias a esta labor puede costera los gastaos que demandan su educación.Isabel espera tu gentil apoyo.

loans.use: To renovate the washroom facilities.

loans.name: Aidee

texts.es:
Thanks to the support her parents provided her, Aidee was able to school and raise her daughters after her husband left them, he not wanting to support their little girls. She set up a small store near the central plaza in her town, and the business earned enough income to cover the household expenses. The room she rents to carry on her sales needs many upgrades and this would be detrimental to the family's finances, ultimately depriving her daughters. Aidee is requesting a loan so that she might invest the funds in the purchase of materials and needed products for her business and to relocate the business to her own house, avoiding the large rent payments.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

Gracias al apoyo de sus padres quienes le brindaron los recursos necesarios para que Aidee pueda criar y educar a sus hijas después de sufrir el abandono de su pareja, quien no quiso responsabilizarse de sus pequeñas niñas, instaló una pequeña tienda cerca de la plaza de su localidad, negocio que le brinda ingresos necesarios para solventar los gastos de su hogar, pero el local es alquilado y para mantener sus ventas y ganancias tiene que realizar diversos ajustes económicos en su canasta familiar perjudicando el bienestar de sus hijas. Por ello Aidee solicita un préstamo con el objetivo de invertirlos en la compra de mercadería y productos necesarios para su negocio y la mudanza a su propio domicilio a fin de dejar de pagar las cuantiosas rentas del local.

loans.use: To move her place of business and increase her investments.

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es:
Reyna, since she was a little girl, has always worked in agriculture. Despite the challenges that she met along the way, she has managed to make it alongside her husband. Everything was going well with their plantation but then they were faced with the illness of their young daughter suffering from intestinal problems. The illness put the family in a bind. Having gone through that seemingly endless time in their life, she wants to fulfill her dreams of being a business woman and not only to grow and sell vegetables but also establish a small grocery store in their home. For this, she is requesting a loan to start her business in the near future.

Tranlsated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

REYNA, desde niña se ha dedicado a la agricultura, a pesar de los inconvenientes que surgieron años atrás salió adelante con su esposo, cuando todo marchaba bien en sus cultivos tuvieron que afrontar la enfermedad de su pequeña hija que sufrió de serios problemas intestinales, enfermedad que puso en aprietos a la familia.Ahora después de haber pasado por un sin fin de problemas desea cumplir sus deseos de negociante y no tan solo producir verduras y venderlas sino poner un negocio de venta de abarrotes que está presta a instalar en su domicilio, por ese motivo solicita un préstamo a fin de poner en marcha este proyecto en corto tiempo.

loans.use: To increase her capital income to build a small grocery store.

loans.name: Triunfadoras Group

texts.es:
The Triumphant Communal Bank is a bank that began recently and at present has 22 associates. Some of them were guests of associates of another Communal Bank and by the property development company.

The associates have different business such as selling cereals, natural products of the coca leaf, clothes, crafts, cosmetics, cebiche (a seafood dish), jewels, hardware, vegetables, groceries and woven crafts.

The associates need different amounts of loans, such as 300 soles, 450 soles, 600 soles, 1000 soles, coming to a total of 12,050 soles of loans in the Communal Bank.

The loans will be invested in the purchase of corn, wheat, carbonated water, wool, threads, office supplies, natural products, poles, chompas, pants, lingerie, rice, sugar, lemon, tomato, tools, and jewels.

The dreams of the associates are that their children will study and become professionals, to complete the construction of their house, to do well on their own without the aid of anyone, and to grow their business and have more capital.

Translated from Spanish by B, Kiva Volunteer.

El Banco Comunal Triunfadoras es un Banco que recién inicia, actualmente tiene 22 socias, algunas D. ellas fueron invitadas por socias D. otro Banco Comunal y por la promotora.

Las socias realizan diferentes negocios como la venta D. cereales, productos naturales D. la hoja D. coca, ropa, artesanía, cosméticos, cebiche, joyas, ferretería, verduras, abarrotes y artesanía en telar.

Las socias necesitan diferentes montos D. préstamos, algunos montos son D. 300 soles, 450 soles, 600 soles, 1000 soles, haciendo un total D. 12,050 soles D. préstamos en el Banco Comunal.

Los préstamos lo invertirán en la compra D. maíz, trigo, gaseosas, trigo, lanas, hilos, útiles D. escritorio, productos naturales, polos, chompas, pantalones, lencería, arroz, azúcar, limón, tomate, herramientas, joyas.

Los sueños D. las socias son que sus hijos estudien y sean profesionales, culminar la construcción D. su casa, salir adelante sola sin la ayuda D. nadie, que sus negocios crezcan y tener mas capital.

loans.use: To purchase corn, wheat, carbonated water, wool, threads, office supplies, natural products, poles, chompas, pants, lingerie, rice, sugar, lemon, tomato, tools, and jewels for various businesses.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es:
Elvira has gone through difficult moments in her life, such as overcoming the deaths of her husband and her brother, who were killed in a horrible accident in the city of Lima. They were transporting their products to market when they crashed with another car, causing the deaths of both men. This occurrence caused great sadness in the family and Elvira, as a mother, had to overcome her sadness quickly for the good of her 2 children. Since then she has worked her land and also started buying and selling animals. She has now remarried and has two more children. Through her economic activities she helps her two older children, who live in Lima. She wants to contribute to the fulfillment of their dream—they plan to open a laundry mat in Lima. With this in mind, she would like to increase her investment capital so that she can help her children with the profits from the next harvest.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer.

ELVIRA tuvo momentos muy difíciles en su vida, superar la muerte de su esposo y su hermano, quienes murieron en un fatídico accidente en la ciudad Lima donde al transportar sus productos para su comercialización chocaron con un auto y lamentablemente este accidente ocasionó la muerte de ambos.Este hecho ocasionó un gran desconsuelo en la familia y Elvira como madre tuvo la obligación de superar rápidamente por el bienestar de sus 2 hijos; desde entonces trabajó en sus terrenos de cultivos y empezó a dedicarse a la compra y venta de animales.Ahora se ha vuelto a casar y tiene dos hijos más a través de su actividad económica apoya a sus hijos mayores quienes radican en la ciudad de Lima y desea contribuir al cumplimiento de los sueños de sus hijos, los cuales han planeado abrir una lavandería en la capital.Con este propósito en mente desea ampliar su capital de inversión para contribuir con este sueño con las ganancias de la próxima cosecha.

loans.use: To increase her capital so that she can increase the number of products she plants.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juán works in agriculture and has always been efficient in his labors. The role of father, which he has carried out for 15 years, has helped him to understand the sacrifice and hard labor of the women of the house. His daughter has turned 15 years old and she would like to open a small grocery store in their house so that she can run it and use the profits toward her education. This request is in support of making this dream come true, and he is asking for help from your generous heart.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer.

JUAN se dedica a la agricultura y hasta hoy se ha desempeñado eficientemente en sus labores. El rol de madre que ha desempeñado durante 15 años le ha ayudado a comprender la sacrificada labor de las reinas del hogar.Su hija ya ha cumplido 15 años y desea instalar una pequeña bodega en casa para que ella se encargue de la administración a fin de incluir las ganancias que obtenga en su desarrollo profesional.Su pedido atiende a este sueño y solicita la ayuda de tu generoso corazón.

loans.use: To open a small grocery store.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María didn’t want to marry or live with the father of her daughter, for many reasons that made her unhappy, and she had the courage to confront life without his help. The hard work that she does on her land, cultivating corn and raising livestock, has caused her health to deteriorate notably. She tries to get better and go to the doctor because she knows that her daughter needs her very much. She works hard to increase her crop production and to do this she has to take good care of the land and clean it carefully, with the goal of having a favorable harvest. If you have the ability to contribute to this noble cause, have no doubts about doing so. The requested funds will be used to buy fertilizers.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer.

María no quiso entrelazar su vida con el padre de su hija por diversos hechos que no le hacían sentir feliz y tuvo la valentía de hacerle frente a la vida sin su ayuda.El duro trabajo que realiza en sus terrenos de cultivo de maíz y la crianza de sus animales han desmejorado su salud notablemente y trata de recuperarse y acudir al hospital, por que es conciente de que su hija necesita de ella íntegramente.Lucha por aumentar la producción de sus terrenos de cultivo y para ello requiere cuidarlos y limpiarlos debidamente con el propósito de que su cosecha pueda ser favorable para su economía. Si usted tiene la posibilidad de sumarse a la contribución de esta noble causa no dude en hacerlo debido a que el dinero solicitado será utilizado para adquirir abonos y fertilizantes.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers

loans.name: Alcira

texts.es:
Every morning Alcira goes to the city of Palca to sell the herbs she cultivates on her land. This town is well known for the huge numbers of vendors that come to sell on market days, and it was this fact that motivated Alcira to dedicate herself to this type of work. The income she has made from this job has contributed to improving the quality of life for her beloved family. It is because of this that she would like to improve the quality of the products that she plants.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer.

Alcira, todas la mañanas sale a vender las hierbas que extrae de sus terrenos para comercializarlas en la ciudad de Palca, este lugar es muy conocido por la inmensa cantidad de comerciantes que proliferan los días de feria, y precisamente está característica ha animado a Alcira a dedicarse a esta labor. Los ingresos que ha percibido por esta labor han contribuido a mejorar la calidad de vida de su querida familia y por este motivo desea incrementar la calidad de los productos que estima sembrar.

loans.use: To improve the quality of her products.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro has worked in agriculture since he was very young. He works even harder at it now because he has made his home with his beautiful wife and their lovely children, whom he loves very much. Due to his high level of knowledge, he takes full advantage of his parcels of land and also leaves them fallow sometimes so that the land will grow excellent products for him. It is for this reason that he is requesting a loan to invest in fertilizers for his crops and to take good care of his parcels.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer.

ALEJANDRO, desde muy joven se ha dedicado a la actividad agrícola y ahora aún más debido a que ha conformado su hogar con una bella dama y unos hermosos hijos a quienes ama mucho y se esfuerza a diario.Debido al alto conocimiento que posee tiene que aprovechar al máximo el uso de sus parcelas y hacerlas descansar para que estos le ofrezcan excelentes productos. A razón de este hecho solicita un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para su cosecha y cuidado de sus chacritas.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
Eduardo has recently married and now has the huge responsibility of taking care of a new life. His agricultural work has provided him a decent living, but he would like to increase his income in order to give stability and security to his child. To this end, he plans to increase his working capital with the goal of starting up a small grocery store, which his beloved wife will run. Your help would contribute to the achievement of this goal.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer.

Eduardo, acaba de conformar su hogar y tiene la inmensa responsabilidad de velar por una vida nueva en nuestro planeta, su labor agrícola han podido otorgarle bienestar pero desea acrecentar sus ganancias para brindarle estabilidad e seguridad a su pequeño, para este fin tiene pensado incrementar su capital de trabajo con el objetivo de establecer en poco tiempo un espacio de venta de abarrotes para desarrollo y ocupación de su querida esposa.Vuestra importante ayuda contribuirá con la realización de este deseo.

loans.use: To improve the products he plants

loans.name: Gisela

texts.es:
GiseL. is a self-sacrificing mother and recently has also become a worker and an excellent breeder of small animals. Her wish to contribute to the improvement of her family and herself drives her to do this kind of work. The satisfactions have been few, but very good and she is convinced that with an increase in capital she would be able to obtain better yields for her family. Let us make the petition of this working woman possible.

Translated from Spanish by James Lombardo, Kiva volunteer

GiseL., es una abnegada madre y hace poco también una trabajadora y exigente criadora D. animalitos menores, el deseo D. contribuir a mejorar L. situación por L. que atravesaba su familia L. condujo a introducirse en esta labor. Las satisfacciones han sido pocas pero muy buenas y está convencida que con un incremento en su capital D. trabajo podría obtener mejore réditos para su familia.Posibilitemos L. petición D. esta trabajadora madre.

loans.use: Increase of capital to acquire a larger quantity of animals

loans.name: Aparicio

texts.en:
Aparicio ever since he was very young has been dedicated to agricultural work. His performance has contributed to the development in the means of her family. Thanks to his efforts his children have been able to move themselves to the capital city of their country in order to fulfill their goals. The effort of this working father has allowed required him to recreate himself so that he can provide for his family in distinct places and in diverse situations. Your help will contribute to the improvement of the quality of variation, and quantity of his products now that the money that he is soliciting will be invested into the purchase of fertilizers and other things he needs

Translated from Spanish by James Lombardo, Kiva volunteer

Aparicio, desde muy joven se dedica a la labor agrícola, su desempeño ha contribuido con el desarrollo de las capacidades de su familia y gracias a su esfuerzo sus hijos han podido desplazarse a la ciudad capital de su país para cumplir las metas que se han trazado.El esfuerzo de este trabajador padre ha tenido que multiplicarse ya que ahora tiene que velar por su familia; pero en distintos lugares y en diversas situaciones.Tu apoyo contribuirá con el mejoramiento de la calidad, variedad y cantidad de sus productos ya que el dinero que solicita será invertido en la compra de abonos, fertilizantes y demás cosas que le hacen falta.

loans.use: Purchase of fertilizers and tools

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
Sergio is a diligent working man who on a daily basis goes to his cultivations farms with the objective of observing the development of his vegetables, getting rid of weeds, and to suitably take care of their development. The possibility of selling his crop has helped this young man move around to different cities inside his country and to get to know a little more with respect to everyone of the businesses and their benefits. That is exactly the reason for why he has planned to continue working constantly in this business earning and soliciting loans. This is so he can increase his capital with the hopes of getting the small animals for the new establishment of his profession.

Translated from Spanish by James Lombardo, Kiva volunteer

SERGIO, es un hombre diligente y trabajador que día a día acude a sus campos de cultivo con el objetivo de observar el desarrollo de sus vegetales, limpiarlos de la maleza y abonarlos adecuadamente para su desarrollo.La posibilidad de comercialización han ayudado a este joven a desplazarse por distintas ciudades de su país y conocer un poco más acerca de cada uno de los negocios y los beneficios de los mismos; por esa razón ha planeado incursionar de manera constante en el negocio ganadero y solicita un préstamo para incrementar su capital de trabajo a fin de adquirir los animalitos para el nuevo establecimiento de su actividad.

loans.use: Increase of capital to get more products of his sowing and to establish sooner than later his new activity

loans.name: Loti

texts.en:
Mrs. Loti is 48 years old and is dedicated to the sale of detergents. She sells hers products to the small bordering villages of her city at a very comfortable price. Her dedication to this daily activity is fueled by her motivation to develop personally and improve the education of her beloved children. Her motive is to increase the quantity of products that she offers given that the cleaning products always are needed in the house. With your help this mother with demonstrate to you that with effort and dedication it is possible to get ahead and follow through with anything.

Translated from Spanish by James Lombardo, Kiva volunteer

La señora Loti de 48 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de detergentes, los mismos que distribuye por los caseríos aledaños a su ciudad ofertándolos a un precio muy cómodo, su dedicación a esta actividad diaria, tiene como motivo el desarrollo personal y educativo de su querido hijo.Ella tiene el propósito de acrecentar la cantidad de productos que ofrece debido a que los artículos de limpieza siempre son necesarios en casa y señala que con el su capital no tiene pierde. Con tu ayuda esta madre te demostrará que con esfuerzo y dedicación se puede salir adelante y cumplir con cualquier propósito.

loans.use: Implement her business

loans.name: Lili

texts.es:
The sale of packaged goods and bread products is Lili’s daily routine. She is 37 years old and is the mother of 5 children. This working woman wishes to better the environment of her business and implement a lager quantity of products now that this activity has become economically sustaining, and is what supports her and her family. This is because her store is the only one in the city that supplies so many families. With your important help Lili will be able to put into motion this project of hers in no time

Translated from Spanish by James Lombardo, Kiva volunteer

La venta de abarrotes y productos de pan llevar es la rutina diaria de la señora Lili, quien a sus 37 años, es madre de 05 hijos. Ésta trabajadora madre desea mejorar los ambientes de su negocio e implementarlo con mayor cantidad de productos ya que esta actividad se ha convertido en el sustento económico diario de su familia y porque es la única tienda en varios metros a la redonda de las que se abastecen diariamente una inmensa cantidad de familias.Con tu importante apoyo Lili podrá poner en marcha su proyecto en corto tiempo.

loans.use: Implement her business

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Mrs. Maribel is 27 years old and has three children, who are her reason for living. She is the owner of a motorcycle taxi and her husband is in charge of driving it. Both have proposed to offer security and wellbeing to their beloved children and for this reason are always ready to materialize an opportunity. From one time until now, the vehicle that has granted them self sufficiency is suffering from malfunctions that have effected their income greatly. This is why they are asking for a loan, so they can rent the equipment to fix the motorcycle taxi.

Translated from Spanish by James Lombardo, Kiva volunteer

La señora Maribel de 27 años de edad, tiene 03 hijos los mismos que son la razón de su vida, ella es propietaria de un mototaxi y su esposo se encarga de conducirlo; ambos se han propuesto brindarle seguridad y bienestar a sus queridos hijos y por esa razón siempre están prestos a realizar sus actividades.De un tiempo a este, el vehículo que les otorga el sustento diario viene sufriendo desperfectos que han mermado considerablemente sus ganancias, por esta razón solicita un préstamo a fin de adquirir las herramientas para mejorar las condiciones de su mototaxi.

loans.use: Buy parts for repair of a Motorcycle (Mototaxi)

loans.name: José

texts.es:
It has been years since Mr. José is a driver. He is the owner of a taxi. Mr. José is a hard working man since he has four children. He desires to offer them a proper education, therefore, he is requesting a loan to acquire a similar taxi, in order to lease it and in that way increase his income and his family’s quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Antonella Sacconi, Kiva Volunteer.

El señor José, se dedica al transporte de pasajeros desde hace mucho tiempo, ya que es propietario de un mototaxi, él se esfuerza mucho porque es padre de 04 hijos, su deseo de brindarles una adecuada educación lo conducen a solicitar un préstamo para adquirir una herramienta de trabajo similar a fin de otorgarla en alquiler e incrementar la economía y calidad de vida de su hogar.

loans.use: To buy a taxi

loans.name: Gilmer

texts.es:
Gilmer is 24-years-old, and he is a young parent with many objectives, therefore, he works hard daily. He is a driver and in his spare time he takes care of his small farm. To continue to advance in his career Gilmer bought a taxi, which has been key to support him and his family while his crop harvest. With time his vehicle has deteriorated, that is why he is requesting a loan, since sometimes he returns home with the grief of not to having been able to go to work due to the problems he has had with his vehicle.

Translated from Spanish by Antonella Sacconi, Kiva Volunteer.

Gilmer de 24 años de edad, es un joven padre con muchos objetivos por eso se esfuerza a diario. Él se dedica al transporte de pasajeros(chofer) y en sus ratos libres se dedica al cuidado y mantenimiento de su chacra, para desarrollar su primera actividad ha comprado hace mucho un mototaxi, con esta herramienta ha sostenido su hogar durante el tiempo de espera para obtener los productos que ha sembrado.Los desperfectos que ha venido sufriendo su herramienta de trabajo lo conducen a solicitar un préstamo ya que a menudo tiene que regresar a casa con la pena de no haber podido ir a trabajar por los problemas de su vehículo.

loans.use: To buy parts to repair vehicle

loans.name: Arquímedes

texts.es:
Mr. Archimedes is 43-years-old, and father of five children. It has been years since he is a driver. He is also the owner of two buses, which have helped him increase his earnings. With the income he obtains from driving these vehicles he supports his beloved wife Maria, who takes care of their small farm and the selling of staple foods. Mr. Archimedes desires to build a small corner grocery store, but for that he needs to repair his vehicles, this is the reason he is requesting a loan, so he can soon begin building the grocery store he longs for.

Translated from Spanish by Antonella Sacconi, Kiva Volunteer.

El señor Arquímedes de 43 años de edad es padre de 5 hijos, el se dedica al transporte de pasajeros desde hace mucho tiempo y ahora se ha convertido en propietario de dos motocarros, herramientas que le han ayudado a fortalecer la economía de su hogar, con el ingreso que obtiene de ambos motocarros apoya a su querida esposa la señora Maria, quién se dedica al cuidado de su chacra y a la venta de productos de primera necesidad. El deseo de reparar sus herramientas de trabajo lo conducen a solicitar un préstamo para llevar a cabo este propósito a fin de pronto construir la pequeña bodega que tanto anhela.

loans.use: To buy parts to repair vehicles

loans.name: Astolfo

texts.es:
Mr. Astolfo is 48-years-old, and he is an independent worker (running wood). Nevertheless, he saw the need to buy some land in which he would like to locate a fuel supplier and a parts replacement sale stand. The area where the land is located is very commercial and strategically placed. With your contribution, this industrious parent will have the possibility to make his dreams come true.

Translated from Spanish by Antonella Sacconi, Kiva Volunteer.

El señor Astolfo de 48 años de edad, es trabajador independiente(corredor de madera), sin embargo tiene la necesidad de comprarse un terreno que ha ido revisando durante mucho para ubicar en este lugar un abastecedor de combustible y un stand de venta de repuestos, debido a que la zona es muy comercial y está muy bien ubicada. Con tu importante contribución este trabajador padre hará realidad sus propósitos.

loans.use: To Buy land and parts to repair vehicles

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase more nutrition products to quickly sell / Invertir en mas productos para vender mas rapidamente

loans.name: Weninger

texts.es:
Mr. Weninger is an honest and determined man. With the help and support of his beloved wife, he sales wood in small quantities from his hometown. The great demand and increase in orders from his country’s capital city, have been the most important reasons to request the loan. Mr. Weninger’s objective is to use this loan as capital to continue to invest on his small business.

Translated from Spanish by Antonella Sacconi, Kiva Volunteer.

El señor Weninger, es un hombre cabal y decidido, se dedica a la venta de madera al por menor desde su ciudad natal, con ayuda y bajo la atenta mirada de su querida esposa. La gran solicitud de pedidos desde la ciudad capital de su país ha sido un importante motivo para la solicitud del préstamo, con el objetivo de invertir estee dinero como capital de trabajo.

loans.use: To Buy Wood

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase more tables and chairs for the dining area / Comprar mas mesas y sillas para el comedor

loans.name: Froylan

texts.es:
Froylan Alexander is 25-years-old and since quite some time, he sales groceries at the Campo Verde market. He is the father of Catherine, a three year old girl, who is Froylan’s reason to succeed in life. His life partner Esther, works with him. They wish to provide all the necessary resources for their daughter in order to assure her full development. Froylan and his wife would like to expand their business and therefore their profits. This is the reason why Froylan is requesting a loan; to invest on remodeling his working space and to purchase a greater quantity of basic consumer products.

Translated from Spanish by Antonella Sacconi, Kiva Volunteer.

Froylan Alexander de 25 años de edad se dedica a la venta de abarrotes desde hace mucho tiempo en un puesto del mercado de Campo Verde, es padre de 01 hija de nombre Catherine de 03 añitos de edad la cual es su razón de progreso, su conviviente la señora Esther trabaja junto a él.Las aspiraciones que tiene para su pequeña hija son brindarle los recursos necesarios para su pleno desarrollo. Desea incrementar sus instalaciones y las ganancias de su establecimiento, por esa razón solicita un préstamo a fin de invertirlos en la remodelación de su espacio de trabajo y la compra de mayor cantidad de artículos de primera necesidad.

loans.use: Start up a Business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase more supplies, specifically gas / Invertir en mas mercaderia, especifiamente tanques de gas

loans.name: Ygnolly

texts.es:
Mrs. Ygnolly is 34 years old, she belongs to the Community Bank ”Los Entusiastas” (The Enthusiastic Ones) in the district of Campo Verde. She works selling ice and has a son who is the love of her life. She has a dream to become an important distributor of ice in her area. To be able to achieve this goal, she needs to purchase a freezer and increase the capital that her business has. With your support you will help this mom fulfill her dreams.

Translated from Spanish by Gabe of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

La señora Ygnolly de 34 años de edad, pertenece al banco comunal “Los Entusiastas” en el Distrito de Campo Verde, ella se dedica a la venta de hielo y tiene un hijo que se ha convertido en la luz de su camino.Tiene el deseo de convertirse en una importante distribuidora de hielo de su localidad y para este fin necesita adquirir una congelado e incrementar su capital de trabajo.Tu importante aporte hará realidad los sueños de esta noble mujer.

loans.use: Buy a freezer and increase capital for her business.

loans.name: Betty

texts.es:
Betty Liliana is 35 years old. She is the mother of 4 children and she learned to make various decorations. She perfected her skills by attending classes at an institute and ultimately plans with her education to place the items that she makes on display in her humble home and teach others how to make the decorations. She has a strong will and enthusiasm. She plans on getting a loan, so that she can undergo construction and manage to make more space in her home to exhibit her diverse work.

Translated from Spanish by Edith of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

Betty Liliana de 35 años de edad, es madre de 04 hijos y aprendió a confeccionar diversos adornitos desde pequeño por su grana entusiasmo y capacidad ha decido perfeccionarse en un instituto a fin de poner en su humilde domicilio un espacio de exposición constante y enseñanza de lo que ha aprendido.Con ese deseo en mente hace la solicitud de un préstamo con el noble propósito de poner en marcha la construcción de sus deseos.

loans.use: Start her business

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga is 42 years old. She is a mother of three children. She has been dedicating herself to making textile art, dresses, lingerie and other things. Her constant labor has been has provided her with enough to be able to contribute to supporting her family. She has decided to move her shop to her home and wishes to someday start her own textile factory. With your contribution she will buy equipment that she needs to be able to make her beautiful clothing.

Translated from Spanish by Edith of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

La señora Olga de 42 años de edad, es madre de 03 hijos, desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica al arte textil y confecciona vestidos, lencería y otros, su continua labor le provee lo suficiente para que contribuya con la economía de su hogar. Hace poco ha decidió mudar su taller a su propia casa y tiene deseos de instalar en el una fábrica textil, con tu importante aporte comprará las herramientas que le hacen falta para su desempeño además de materia prima para la confección de sus bellos artículos.

loans.use: Equipment for her own little textile factory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase fabrics, threads and other supplies / Invertir en telas, hilos y otra materia prima

loans.name: Nina

texts.es:
Since she was very young, she has always wanted to work in the textile industrie. For this reason, she has become an excellent seemstress and over time she has obtained sewing machines that make her be able to fill her clients orders each week. Since her orders have increased and the requests have begun to be more elaborate, she needs to purchase two specialized sewing machines (one is a serger). With these new sewing machines she will be able to make her job easier, increase her productivity and make high quality garmets. Your important support will allow this working mother to acheive her dreams.

Translated from Spanish by Mariela of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

Sus aspiraciones desde muy joven han sido en el campo textil, es por eso que la señora Nina se ha convertido en una excelente costurera y adquirido a través del tiempo máquinas de coser que le ayudan a cubrir los pedidos de sus clientes de manera semanal.Debido a que los pedidos se incrementan y las peticiones han ido variando necesita adquirir una máquina remalladora y una recubridora, con ambas facilitará su labor y le otorgará excelentes acabados.Tu importante aporte hará realidad los deseos de esta trabajadora madre.

loans.use: Purchase special sewing machines for her business.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda is 40 years of age and has three sons. She has a small grocery store business that is located out of the home that her husband build to shelter the family. She has also set up a telephone-calling center and has observed her business grow and her popularity increase in a short amount of time. For that reason she wants to take care of her business and to help it grow. She has decided to request a loan to stock it with a greater variety and quantity of items, so that the member’s of the community can be content.

Translated from Spanish by Johnny of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

La señora Yolanda tiene 40 años y tiene tres hijos, se dedica a la venta de abarrotes desde que se instaló en la vivienda que construyó su esposo para albergar a su nueva familia, además ha instalado en este espacio cabinas para realizar llamadas telefónicas y ha observado su crecimiento y acogida en poco tiempo, por esa razón no desea descuidar su pequeña bodeguita y ha decidido solicitar un préstamo para reflotarla y ofertar mayor cantidad de artículos para alegría de los miembros de su comunidad.

loans.use: Capital to restock her little grocery store.

loans.name: Liz

texts.es:
Liz Verónica is 28 years old and she has a 3 year old daughter named Luz Nayeli. She is makes a living by selling shoes that she knits with little stones and sequins on them. She has done this for a while now. She went to school to learn how to do this creative art. She took classes in the city of Trujillo and now in the city of Ucayali she is showing off what she learned. The best way for her to sell her items it to make them once a client has placed an order. She is requesting a loan because she wants to be able to buy more of the items that she needs to be able to make her beautiful shoes.

Translated from Spanish by Mariela of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

Liz Verónica de 28 años de edad, tiene una hijita de nombre Luz Nayeli de 03 añitos de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración de zapatos tejidos (bordados en lentejuelas y piedras), desde hace tiempo. Estudió este arte tan bonito en la ciudad de Trujillo, y ahora en la región Ucayali está demostrando lo que realmente aprendió, sólo trabaja a través de los pedidos de sus clientes, porque nos comenta que es la manera más fácil de vender. Su solicitud atiende a la necesidad de adquirir mayor cantidad de materia prima para seguir confeccionando sus bellos zapatos.

loans.use: Buy the basic materials to make her beautiful shoes.

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es:
39-year-old Gladis sells beauty products from a nationally recognized cosmetics line. Galdis’ desire to contribute to her family’s economic well-being and raise their standard of living keeps her dedicated to her work. She also has clothing for sale and with the help of her beloved husband has built a small store. However, she still enjoys selling the cosmetics, which is why she is looking to increase her working capital and invest in a greater quantity of products for her esteemed clients.

Translated from Spanish by Nathan, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Gladis de 39 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de productos de Belleza de una línea cosmética muy reconocida a nivel nacional, su dedicación a esta actividad tiene el objetivo de contribuir con la economía de su hogar a fin de elevar el nivel de vida de su querida familia. También oferta prendas de vestir y con la ayuda de su querido esposo ha construido una pequeña bodeguita, sin embargo disfruta mucho con su primera actividad, por esa razón desea incrementar su capital de trabajo para así ofrecer mayor cantidad de productos a sus estimados clientes.

loans.use: Buy a greater quantity and quality of cosmetic products for her business

loans.name: Gisela

texts.es:
Mrs. Gisela Marjorie is a tough, independent woman who has recently turned her long-standing soft-drink business into a small, successful bar. She has wanted to provide better security to her many customers, but each of her efforts has not been sufficient to improve the bar’s installations. She is applying for this loan to provide better comfort for her clients.

Translated from Spanish by Nathan, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Gisela Marjorie se dedica a la venta de bebidas heladas desde hace mucho tiempo, es una mujer luchadora en poco tiempo ha construido un pequeño bar muy visitado y ha decidido otorgar seguridad a cada uno de los clientes que la visitan, sin embargo todos y cada uno de sus esfuerzos no han sido suficientes para mejorar sus instalaciones, por esa razón solicita un préstamo a fin de brindar comodidad a sus clientes.

loans.use: Improve the installations of her small bar

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase more recyclable materials / Comprar mas material reciclable

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Angela is a teacher who decided to open up a small grocery store from her home, due to her family’s economic necessity. This new and important occupation has contributed to improve her family's quality of life. Now Angela would like a loan to better stock her store with basic goods.

Translated from Spanish by Nathan, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Angela es maestra y debido a las necesidades económicas por las que atravesaba su familia decidió aperturar una pequeña bodeguita en su domicilio, con esta nueva e importante ocupación ha contribuido con el mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de su familia y ahora está deseosa de obtener un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de mayor cantidad de artículos de primera necesidad a fin de consolidar su pequeño centro de ventas.

loans.use: Improve the quality and quantity of items for sale in her small store

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es:
Two years ago Lilian received an idea from family members to start selling children’s clothes from the school where she works as a teacher. She decided to give it a shot, and since then has been very successful, thanks to help from her parents and family members.

Due to the large amount of orders she recieves, Lilian is applying for a loan so as to invest in greater quantities and varieties of garments. With your important contribution, this honest woman will continue working with her beloved parents.

Translated from Spanish by Nathan, Kiva Volunteer.

La señorita Lilian, se desempeña como maestra en un centro educativo de su localidad, hace un par de años sus familiares que residen en la capital le dieron la idea de ofertar prendas de vestir para niños desde su centro de estudios con el propósito de mejorar sus situación económica, decidió incursionar en este campo y ha ido cosechando satisfacciones gracias a la ayuda de sus padres y familiares, debido a la inmensa solicitud de prendas, solicita un préstamo a fin de invertirlos en la compra de mayor cantidad y variedad de prendas.Con tu importante ayuda esta noble mujer seguirá contribuyendo con sus ancianos y amorosos padres.

loans.use: Buy a greater quantity and variety of garments for her clothes sales

loans.name: Luana

texts.es:
23-year-old Luana observed her community’s great demand for water and decided to enter this service as a business, with the aim of providing water for the many families adjacent to her house. The demand for her service has increased, as have the living standards for Luana and her 3 year-old little girl.

Luana has since decided to lay out a network of tubing from her humble home to further supply her neighbors' demand. She is applying for a loan so as to set this project in motion. With your important contribution Luana’s dreams will become reality.

Translated from Spanish by Nathan, Kiva Volunteer.

Luana de 23 años de edad, es madre de una pequeña niña de tres años de edad; observó la gran demanda de agua en su comunidad y decidió incursionar en este negocio con el fin de abastecer a las numerosas familias que colindan cerca de su domicilio. La demanda se ha incrementado y también las satisfacciones para ella y su pequeña niña así que ha decidido abastecerlos tendiendo redes tubulares desde su humilde domicilio; con este propósito en mente solicita un préstamo para poner en marcha este proyecto.Con tu importante ayuda el sueño de muchas familias se hará realidad.

loans.use: Invest in a tubing system to distribute water to many families in her neighborhood

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel is an active, hard-working woman who teaches at a preschool in the mornings and in the afternoons can be found making the rounds throughout her city’s streets selling beauty products. This second job has allowed her to improve the income of her beloved family.

Maribel has decided to set up her business permanently in her house. To do this she will need a glass showcase to display the beauty products. Your important contribution will help fulfill this goal.

Translated from Spanish by Nathan, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Maribel es una mujer muy activa y trabajadora, por las mañanas se desempeña como maestra en un centro inicial de su ciudad y por las tardes recorre sus calles ofertando sus productos de belleza, la ayuda económica que obtiene de esta labor han servido para elevar el nivel de vida de su amada familia, con el propósito de ofertar sus productos en su domicilio de manera permanente ha decidido adquirir una vitrina para exponerlos, vuestra importante colaboración permitirá la realización de este deseo.

loans.use: To buy a glass showcase for her cosmetic products

loans.name: María

texts.es:
Maria Elizabeth is 36 years old and has two children who are 12 and 10 years old. Maria works selling sweets out of a small kiosk that she had built a while ago. Her daily efforts have made her popular and she has met the requests of all of her young customers. Her desire to enlarge her small store has driven her to request a loan in order to put the project in motion.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

Maria Elizabeth de 36 años, tiene dos hijos de 12 y 02 años de edad, ella se dedica a vender golosinas en un pequeño kiosco que mandó a construir hace mucho tiempo, su esfuerzo diario ha contribuido a su popularidad y ha albergado durante mucho tiempo las solicitudes de los niños.El deseo de incrementar sus veces y ampliar su pequeño espacio de ventas la conducen a solicitar un préstamo a fin de poner en marcha su gran proyecto.

loans.use: To fix up and prepare her small sales area

loans.name: Clara

texts.es:
Clara has been selling basic necessities ever since she first set up her small shop out of her humble home. In addition to this business she also sells firewood upon request. These two activities have enabled her family to improve their quality of life. Clara's main desire is to continue working so that her family can accomplish their goals. Your support will help this selfless mother acquire a larger quantity of products and enlarge her small store.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

Clara desde hace tiempo se ha dedicado a la comercialización de artículos de primera necesidad desde la pequeña bodeguita que instaló en su humilde domicilio, con esta actividad además de la venta de leña que realiza esporádicamente y bajo pedidos ha logrado que su familia goce de mayores beneficios y su deseo es continuar con su labor para que estos puedan cumplir cada una d las metas que se han trazado. Vuestro importante aporte servirá para que esta abnegada madre adquiera mayor cantidad de productos y para la ampliación de su pequeña bodeguita.

loans.use: Purchase of more basic necessities and to enlarge a small shop

loans.name: Milka

texts.es:
Mrs. Milka is 34 years old and the mother of 4 children. She works every day in a small location offering an enormous variety of products to her customers. She sells cookies, sweets, soft drinks and other food products that are the fascination of all the local children. Her work has enabled her to better manage her home. She has decided to ask for a loan so that she can set up a better sales location. She would like to have her workplace ready for the beginning of the school year, as the children are her main source of income.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

La señora Milka de 34 años de edad, tiene 04 hijos, su labor diaria la desempeña en un pequeño espacio en el que oferta una inmensa variedad de galletas, dulces, gaseosa y demás comestibles que son la fascinación de los más pequeños. Con esta labor ha podido extender las satisfacciones en su hogar y decidido solicitar un préstamo para implementar y acondicionar mejor su espacio de ventas a fin de iniciar una buena faena en cuanto inicie la labor escolar, fuente de sus ingresos diarios.

loans.use: To set up a proper sales location

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es:
Mrs. Juliana is 35 years old and the mother of a 17 year old girl named Sindy Greys, a beacon of light in Juliana's life. Juliana has been working for a long time selling fish with the help of her beloved husband. She has also recently begun selling embroidered shoes. These two activities have given wellbeing and security to her family. With the income the businesses have generated she has been able to raise her family's quality of life in a short amount of time. She would like to invest more in her business in order to increase her earnings, with the overall objective of sales location in the most popular market in her city.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

La señora Juliana de 35 años de edad, es madre de una hija de 17 años de nombre Sindy Greys, quien se ha convertido en la luz que alumbra su camino. Ella desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica a la venta de pescado con ayuda de su querido esposo y ahora adicionalmente a la venta de zapatos bordados; estas dos actividades le han proporcionado bienestar y seguridad a su querida familia ya que con los ingresos que percibe ha podido elevar su calidad de vida en poco tiempo.Desea incrementar su capital de trabajo para acrecentar sus ganancias con el objetivo de adquirir un puesto de ventas en el mercado más visitado de su ciudad.

loans.use: Investment in her business in order to increase earnings

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Mrs. Estela works selling fresh fish every day. With the help of her husband, Estela leaves home at the crack of dawn to buy her delicious fish directly from a pier in her city. She then sells them from a local market. Estela would really like to be the primary supplier of fish to the people of her city. With your help she will be able to turn this dream into reality.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

La venta de pescado fresco es la actividad diaria que desarrolla la señora Estela. Desde muy temprano y con la ayuda de su querido esposo se dispone a abandonar su casa para dirigirse al puerto a comprar estos deliciosos productos con el objetivo de ofrecerlos en su respectivo puesto de ventas en el mercado de su ciudad. Ella está muy deseosa de convertirse en la primera persona deseosa de ofertar estos productos al por mayor, con tu importante ayuda podrá convertir en poco tiempo este sueño en realidad.

loans.use: To offer a wider variety of fish

loans.name: Lila

texts.es:
Mrs. Lila lives to attend to her customers and proviD. them with good service. She works selling chickens in a local market of her city. She has been doing this for a long time and thanks to her hard work she has formed good relationships with many of her customers. Mrs. Lila is a mother of 4 children. Only one of the children lives at home, as he studies at the city university. This diligent mother would like to have more capital to invest in her business so that she can continue her hard work. She wishes to increase her earnings so that she can help her beloved son realize his dreams. Your support will help turn her own dreams into reality.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

Dar una buena atención a sus y clientes es la rutina diaria D. la señora Lila, quien se dedica a la venta D. pollos beneficiados en un puesto del mercado D. su ciudad, ella se dedica a esta actividad desD. hace mucho tiempo y gracias a su desempeño dirio ha podido entablar amistad con muchas amas D. casa que la visitan diariamente.Es madre D. cuatro hijos y sólo uno D. ellos permanece actualmente en casa debido a que se encuentra estudiando en la universidad D. su ciudad. Ésta trabajadora madre tiene deseos D. incrementar su capital D. trabajo a fin D. continuar con su labor y elevar sus ganancias para contribuir un poco más con los sueños D. su querido hijo.Tu importante aporte hará realidad los deseos D. ésta trabajadora madre.

loans.use: To offer a wider variety of chickens to customers

loans.name: Vera Iris

texts.en:
Vera is a 28 year-old single Ghanaian woman who resides in the Mamprobi neighborhood of Accra.
A graduate of secondary school, she also holds certificates in the areas of catering and home economics and was recognized as the best student in food production by HOTCATT, the hotel, catering, and tourism
institute where she studied.  Although employed as a cook, she would like to establish her own business, “Fruities,” which would sell fresh fruit drinks (“smoothies”).  She is seeking a loan of $800 to be used for
the purchase of raw materials (fruit) and equipment such as blenders and a freezer.

loans.use: Business Start-up

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María is 38-years-old and makes a living by selling fresh fish at a stand at the market. She has four children, who have become her reason for being since their arrival. María has the responsibilities of both father and mother because she was widowed five years ago. She has a lot of strength to keep growing her business because she has a great clientele that likes the selection of fish that she offers. She has the goal of increasing her profits and the quality of life of her family. She hopes to increase her working capital. Your help will be very important for this noble mother.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva volunteer

La señora María de 38 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de pescado fresco en un puesto del mercado, ella tiene cuatro hijos los mismos que desde su llegada se han convertido en su razón de ser, Maria tiene la responsabilidad de padre y madre a causa de que quedó viuda hace cinco años.Tiene mucha fuerza de voluntad para seguir creciendo con su negocio ya que cuenta con una gran clientela que gusta de los pescados seleccionados que oferta, con el propósito de incrementar sus ganancias y la calidad de vida de su familia, desea incrementar su capital de trabajo.Vuestra ayuda será muy importante para ésta noble madre.

loans.use: Increase in capital to offer a better quality of selected fish

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
I have a general store in my house. I mind the store all day, and my son and I live off of its profits. I am a single mother and have always liked to work and get ahead in life. I have had my store for a year and a half now, and I thank God that everything has gone well. I intend to invest in the purchase of deli meats because my customers have requested them, but I have not been able to meet their demands due to lack of funds. I am requesting $500.00 USD to invest in my business.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

“Tengo una tienda de abarrotes en mi casa, la atiendo todo el día y de ahí vivimos mi hijo y yo, soy madre soltera y siempre me ha gustado trabajar y salir adelante, ya tengo 1 año y medio con mi tienda y gracias a dios me ha ido bien, tengo la intención de invertir en la compra de carnes frías ya que mis clientes me lo has solicitado pero yo no he podido por falta de dinero para la inversión Solicito $ 500.00 dlls para invertir en mi negocio.

loans.use: Invest in my business

loans.name: Jose Hedi

texts.es:
I put up plywood, posts, and wire around my yard to prevent criminals from breaking in. I need to build a protective concrete fence as soon as possible because there are a lot of thieves in this area who have burglarized my neighbors’ homes in the past, and I do not want put my family in danger. I am requesting a loan of $1,200.00 USD in order to build a protective concrete fence around my home.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

“En el patio de mi vivienda he puesto maderas, palos y alambres para evitar que se metan a robar, tengo la necesidad de construir una barda lo antes posible ya que en esa colonia hay muchos bandidos, ya se han metido a robar en otras casas y no me gusta que mi familia este en riesgo” Solicito $ 1,200.00 dlls para construir una barda en mi vivienda

loans.use: Construction of concrete fence

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María Teresa is an enterprising woman who sells spices and seasonings to offer better flavor to the dishes that housewives make. Because of her beautiful smile and friendliness with which she attends to her clients, she doesn't stop selling. Her clients always seem satisfied with her good service. She is 34-years-old and is the mother of 3 children. She hopes to expand her business and further implement her small sales space with the goal of increasing her profits and her quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva volunteer

María Teresa, mujer emprendedora y dedicada a la venta de especias y aliños para otorgarle mejor sabor a los platillos de las amas de casa, por su linda sonrisa y amabilidad al atender no deja de vender, pues sus caseras siempre se muestran satisfechas por su buena atención. Tiene 34 años y es madre de 03 hijos, desea ampliar e implementar más su pequeño espacio de ventas a fin de incrementar sus ganancias y su calidad de vida.

loans.use: Increase in capital to expand her business

loans.name: Juanita

texts.es:
Juanita is a very active woman with dreams of getting ahead. She has sold beauty products for some time. She works for a cosmetic line that is well-known at the national level. Because of her good service and friendliness, she has a numerous clientele. This is why she opted to sell more products in her humble home that also serves as her display and advising space. She needs a display case to better display her products, and she is requesting your support to obtain a loan with the goal of making her dreams a reality.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva volunteer

Juanita, es una mujer muy activa y con deseos de superación, se dedica desde hace buen tiempo a la venta de productos de belleza, trabaja para una línea cosmética muy conocida a nivel nacional y por su buena atención y amabilidad cuenta con una clientela numerosa, es por eso que optó por implementar con más productos su humilde hogar que le sirve también de espacio de exposición y asesoramiento, le hace falta una vitrina para una mejor exposición y solicita vuestro apoyo para obtener un préstamo a fin de hacer realidad sus deseos.

loans.use: Purchase of a display case

loans.name: Janeth

texts.es:
Janeth has a mini sawmill, and her arduous work has intensified lately since her small shop where they work is located in her home, and the discomfort and lack of space have become more evident. For this reason, they have planned to move and to rent a space in an adequate place for its operation. With your important contribution, these beloved and hard-working parents will continue with their work.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva volunteer

Janeth tiene un mini aserradero y el arduo trabajo de un tiempo a esta parte se ha intensificado ya que el pequeño taller en el que laboran está ubicado dentro de su domicilio y la incomodidad y falta de espacio se han hecho más que evidentes por esa razón han planeado mudarse y alquilar un espacio en un lugar adecuado para su funcionamiento.Con tu importante contribución estos queridos y trabajadores padres continuarán con su labor.

loans.use: To move and to rent an adequate space to establish her shop

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Selling beauty products is the daily work of señora Ana Consuelo. She gets ready very early to travel the streets in search of women who desire personal advice so they can look more beautiful every day. With the goal of improving the quality of life of her family and with dreams of progress, she has been able to establish a wide portfolio of clients, who turn to her month after month. While keeping this in mind, and since she has the space in her house where she sells her products, she has decided to acquire a display case to display her articles permanently with the goal of having them at arm's reach when one of her valued clients wants to look at them.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva volunteer

La venta de productos de belleza es el trabajo diario de la señora Ana Consuelo, desde muy temprano se dispone a recorrer las calles en búsqueda de damas que deseen un asesoramiento personal para verse cada día más hermosas, con el propósito de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y sus deseos de progreso ha podido establecer una amplia cartera de clientes, quienes mes a mes acuden en su búsqueda.Teniendo en cuenta esto y contando con el espacio que dispone en casa ha decidido adquirir una vitrina para exponer de manera permanente sus artículos a fin de tenerlos siempre a la mano en cuanto haya alguna disposición de sus queridos clientes.

loans.use: Purchase of a display case

loans.name: Melardo

texts.es:
Melardo is 38-years-old, is the father of 6 children, and is a very active man. He also has a business where he sells groceries and candy. He works in a public organization that is very well known in the region. When he is on vacation, he dedicates himself fully to selling groceries, since he considers himself an active and hard-working man. He hopes to increase the quantity of articles that he offers so his family can fulfill their dreams with the help of the income that this occupation will offer them in a short time.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva volunteer

El señor Melardo de 38 años de edad, es padre de seis hijos, es un hombre muy activo pues adicionalmente de tener un negocio de venta de abarrotes y golosinas, trabaja en una entidad pública muy reconocida en la región y cuando está de vacaciones se dedica íntegramente a la venta de abarrotes pues se considera un hombre activo y trabajador.Desea incrementar la cantidad de artículos que oferta a fin de que su familia logre concretar sus sueños con ayuda de los ingresos que esta ocupación le otorgue en corto tiempo.

loans.use: Increase in capital to increase the quantity and variety of the products he offers

loans.name: Petalo De Rosa, Group 1

texts.en:
Francisco (pictured far right) is a lovely 53-year-old man who lives with his wife and five children in the suburb of Los Alcarrizzos, which is on the outskirts of the capital, Santo Domingo. He is the director of a local high school that he founded, and has requested this loan so that he can add more books and supplies to his school thereby creating a better learning environment for his students. With a better reputation, he knows that he can attract more students, and consequently increase his profit margin.

His dream is to continue “developing and amplifying the school in all senses,” to enable his children to become professionals in the future, and to improve his quality of life. In his free time he loves to take pictures.

On behalf of Francisco and everyone here at Esperanza International, we thank you for your support of Francisco’s high school!

loans.use: Purchase school supplies and books

loans.name: Petalo De Rosa. Group 2

texts.en:
Rosita (pictured far right) is a vibrant 33-year-old who lives with her husband and three children in a suburb called Los Alcarrizzos, which is about a 30-minute drive from the capital of Santo Domingo. She has a small cafeteria called “Cafeteria Rosita” that specializes in making lollipops. Rosita is asking for this loan so that she can expand the products she is able to offer her clients. Specifically, she wants to offer more fried foods like empanadas, tostones, and fried chicken.

Her dreams are to continue expanding her business, and to work so that her children can continue to study.

On behalf of Rosita and everyone here at Esperanza International, we thank you for your support of Rosita’s cafeteria!

loans.use: Purchase ingredients and cooking supplies to make fried foods

loans.name: Petalo De Rosa, Group 3

texts.en:
Miomis (pictured far left) is 34 years old and lives with her four children in the town of L. Alcarrizzos on the outskirts of the capital, Santo Domingo. She runs a successful business from her home selling new clothing, some jewelry and beauty items, and a small selection of shoes—she calls her business “El Rinconcito.” She has applied for this loan so that she can buy a larger selection of merchandise, and at a bulk price—that way she will be able to both offer her clients more choice and increase her profit margin.

Her dreams are to see her business grow enough so that her children can continue their studies and one day she will be able to see them become professionals. She also has ambitions to expand her business and make it bigger, stronger, and more widely known.

Miomis’ biggest challenge right now comes from renting her house. While renting, she is forced to pay a high price for a house that is of poor quality. She hopes that this loan will help her save more money towards buying her own house one day soon. In the little free time that she has, Miomis says she loves to read.
